adDetails: I am an editorial specialist with two decades of experience in developing print and online content with style and voice. My work includes content editing, copy writing, technical writing, SEO/SEM, journalism, press releases, and speech writing. I have worked on marketing campaigns and a wide range of projects for corporate marketing firms, major retail companies, and governmental associations. Contact for portfolio. My areas of expertise include: copy and content editing, project management, style manual development, hiring and managing freelance and on-site staff, writing, proofreading, and proficiency in Mac/PC and CMS platforms. I also have experience with both Chicago Manual of Style and AP Style.
